attributes.action: Call for a National Day of Prayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We recognise that God is our refuge and strength.  Psalm 127:1 Unless the LORD builds a house, the work of the builders is useless. Unless the LORD protects a city, guarding it with sentries will do no good.  This verse is embedded in the floor of the central lobby area of the Houses of Parliament.

The Armed Forces are stationed in various parts of the world and are facing great danger to their lives every day.  In view of this we call for a national day of prayer for their safety and a speedy end to the various conflicts.
